name: Bassumi Bakes
description: A user-friendly online platform showcasing a variety of desserts, including cakes, cupcakes, and brownies, available for order.

name: Data Platform Project
description: Our team is taking over a MEVN stack web app to improve and expand it. Goals include adding profile picture uploads, user confirmation for irreversible actions, and optimizing data loading by reducing the number of requests per page.

name: Interstellar Transportation
description: This project manages a fleet of spaceships and their cargo using a RESTful API built with Flask and MySQL. Users can perform CRUD operations on spaceships, cargo, and captains, facilitating efficient space logistics management.
technologies: EJS, JAVASCRIPT, NODE, PYTHON, FLASK, MYSQL

name: Inventory Management
description: This project involves creating a program to manage an electronics store's inventory. It reads data from CSV files containing item details, prices, and service dates. The program then processes this data to generate reports, which facilitates inventory tasks.
